entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in showers this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 7:22 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:22 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers beginning in the evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:22 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
